fr:mainmatter.fr:p: We will need to make precise the above construction when passing to derived categories, and to give a relative variant of it.

The functor \mathrm {s}\colon \operatorname {C}^+(S_\bullet )\to \operatorname {C}^+(S) sends acyclic complexes to acyclic complexes. It thus trivially derives to \mathrm {s}\colon \operatorname {D}^+(S_\bullet ) \to \operatorname {D}^+(S).
